no_forbidden_words.name: Labels: no forbidden words
no_forbidden_words.description: Checks if labels of nodes are ’meaningful’ by matching them against an array (/list) of forbidden words. If any forbidden word is used then the test fails and reports what forbidden word was used.

only_mandatory_words.name: Labels: only mandatory words.
only_mandatory_words.description: Checks if labels of nodes are ’meaningful’ by matching them against an array (/list) of mandatory words. If another word is used then the test fails and reports what illegal word was used.

no_duplicate_label.name: Labels: No duplicates
no_duplicate_label.description: Checks if there are no duplicate labels.

left_to_right.name: Left to right
left_to_right.description: Checks if the modeling is left-to-right. That is, all arcs are left-to-right.

crossing_arcs.name: Number of crossing arcs
crossing_arcs.description: Check if the number of crossing arcs is at most a given natural number.

horizontally_adjacent.name: Nodes horizontally adjacent
horizontally_adjacent.description: Check if for a given array of labels all the nodes matching the labels are (approximately) horizontally adjacent.

vertically_adjacent.name: Nodes vertically adjacent
vertically_adjacent.description: Check if for a given array of labels all the nodes matching the labels are (approximately) vertically adjacent.

list_left_of.name: Node groups horizontal separation.
list_left_of.description: Check if for two given arrays A, B with labels, all the nodes matching the labels in A are left of all the nodes with labels in B. Fails if A, B have an overlapping label.

list_above_of.name: Node groups vertical separation.
list_above_of.description: Check if for two given arrays A, B with labels, all the nodes matching the labels in A are above all the nodes with labels in B. Fails if A, B have an overlapping label.

top_to_bottom.name: Top to bottom
top_to_bottom.description: Check if the modeling is top-to-bottom. That is, all arcs are top-to-bottom.
